timeline.bodyText: 1 second feels a bit too much to me. This is sometimes more than what it takes to actually refresh. What about 500ms?

timeline.bodyText:
Is there any class where constants like this one are saved, I did not find an appropriate one.
Furthermore I changed the duration to 750ms which is the time for one repetition.
timeline.author: asdoi

replies.bodyText: Good question. I don't think we have a class for such constants. The most Android way would probably be to use the core/res/values/integers.xml file and then load with getResources().getInteger(R.integer.xy)
